name: Overpowered (proxyerror, tigeryue)
description:
This is an entry game for GMTK 2020 - Out of Control

You play as RIN - a girl with an OVERPOWERED fist.

Her fist is OUT OF CONTROL and will AUTOMATICALLY throw punches and fistwaves every 1.2 seconds.

CONTROLS -

W A S D to move.

Use Mouse to aim.

No other controls. Characters will automatically punch every 1.2 seconds.

The fistwaves can hurt both ENEMIES and INNOCENT citizens.

BEAT ENEMIES and AVOID HURTING CITIZENS with RIN!

If you kill more than 5 citizens, the game will be over.

Updated Versions to be downloaded here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hlY_zciWAvDKh9qaNS0B_Yjz_fLndP5O/view?usp=shari...

Team:

Liu Daoxin - Design and Animation

Denny - Design

Shyoujyo_senryaku - Design and Programming

Tigeryue - Design and Programming

Li Haoyuan - Design and Programming

Nicole Luo - Animation and Opening title artist

Ershu - Environment Art

Xiaohua - Music
